Tamás Prileszky, Ph.D.

POSTS PROJECTS

About

Tamás is a post-doctoral scholar in Prof. Matthew Helgeson’s lab at University of California, Santa Barbara.

He earned his doctoral degree under Prof. Eric Furst at University of Delaware.

You can view his curriculum vitae here.

He is currently the oldest he has ever been and was once the youngest human alive.

    in progress
  • Magnetite nanoparticles program the assembly, response, and reconfiguration of structured emulsions
  • Model of Structured Emulsion Droplet Stability and Reconfigurability
  • Fluid Networks Assembled from Endoskeletal Droplets
  • Crystallization Kinetics of Partially Crystalline Emulsion Droplets in a Microfluidic Device
  • Statistics of droplet sizes generated by a microfluidic device
